text: Sliver is a 1993 American erotic thriller movie. It stars Sharon Stone and William Baldwin. The movie is focused on mysterious things that happen in a privately owned Manhattan highrise apartment complex. Sliver got bad movie reviews, although it did well at the box office. == Other websites == * Category:1990s erotic movies Category:1990s mystery movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:1990s serial killer movies Category:1993 thriller movies Category:American erotic movies Category:American mystery movies Category:American psychological movies Category:American thriller movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in Manhattan Category:Movies directed by Phillip Noyce
title: Sliver (movie)
